name: Liquid Audio File
summary: Learn about .LQT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
RealNetworks RealPlayer Cloud with Liquid Audio plugin

content: Liquid Audio became Liquid Digital Media in January 2003 when it was acquired by Anderson Media. The company still provides solutions for Internet media delivery, but the LQT file format is no longer used.

description: Music file saved in the proprietary copy-protected Liquid Audio format; can only be opened and played with Liquid Audio Player and RealPlayer on authorized computers.
